global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Decor” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||divi||400″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” icon_color=”#e878e8″ header_text_color=”#e878e8″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

We specialize in crafting exquisite table settings, stage displays, and reception features. With our experienced team and creative ideas, we excel at putting together gorgeous displays using our extensive range of hired stock items. If we don’t have the exact item you’re looking for, we’ll go the extra mile to source it or have it custom-made just for you.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”FUNCTION SETUP” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||400″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}” icon_color=”#e878e8″ header_text_color=”#e878e8″]

We’ll be fully acquainted with your final layout and details. It only makes sense for us to handle the venue set-up as well. This frees you to focus on preparing for the event and ensures you can arrive cool, calm, and collected. From hanging draping and fairy lights to covering chairs, setting tables, positioning flowers, and all the final tweaks, you can trust us to leave the venue perfectly ready for you and your guests to arrive and enjoy themselves.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”CANDLES TO HIRE” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”||fa||900″ image_icon_width=”50px” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” body_text_align=”center” global_colors_info=”{}” icon_color=”#e878e8″ header_text_color=”#e878e8″]

All our candles are handmade in-house, offering a cost-effective and environmentally friendly alternative to purchasing candles that burn away. Our pillar candles come in various heights and widths, and we also offer floating candles for added ambiance.
Additionally, our fairy lights are available in 4-meter, 10-meter, and 20-meter lengths, with uplighters also on offer to illuminate your event space.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
